classical.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
classical.description: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chunks of chocolate.

classical.name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
classical.description: Hearty cookies made with oats, raisins, and a hint of cinnamon.

classical.name: Peanut Butter Cookies
classical.description: Rich and nutty cookies with a crumbly texture, often topped with a chocolate kiss.

specialty.name: Macarons
specialty.description: Elegant French cookies with a delicate meringue shell and flavorful filling.

specialty.name: Florentine Cookies
specialty.description: Thin and crispy almond cookies topped with caramel and chocolate.

specialty.name: Alfajores
specialty.description: South American sandwich cookies filled with dulce de leche and rolled in coconut flakes.

shortbread.name: Classic Shortbread
shortbread.description: Buttery and crumbly cookies with a melt-in-your-mouth texture.

shortbread.name: Lemon Shortbread
shortbread.description: Shortbread cookies infused with lemon zest and drizzled with lemon icing.

shortbread.name: Chocolate-Dipped Shortbread
shortbread.description: Shortbread fingers dipped in rich dark or milk chocolate.

healthier.name: Oatmeal Banana Cookies
healthier.description: Soft and naturally sweetened cookies made with ripe bananas, oats, and a hint of cinnamon.

healthier.name: Almond Flour Cookies
healthier.description: Gluten-free cookies made with almond flour, honey, and dark chocolate chips.

healthier.name: Vegan Peanut Butter Cookies
healthier.description: Plant-based cookies made with peanut butter, maple syrup, and flax eggs.

testimonials.testimony: These cookies are absolutely delicious! I can't get enough of them.
testimonials.name: Emily Johnson

testimonials.testimony: The cookies were fantastic! My family loved them.
testimonials.name: John Smith

testimonials.testimony: Amazing cookies! They're perfect for any occasion.
testimonials.name: Sarah Thompson
